title: Generate Android release APK artifact for Phoenix Boutique

requirements.text: Generate an Android **release** APK artifact for Phoenix Boutique suitable for installation/distribution, using the existing mobile release build configuration, and make the produced APK available as a build output with a clearly identifiable filename.
acceptanceCriteria: A release APK can be produced successfully from the repository using the existing release build configuration (no manual code edits required to complete the build).
The build outputs a single, clearly named APK file (e.g., PhoenixBoutique-release.apk) and its location/path is documented for maintainers.

If release signing requires a keystore that is not committed, the build uses placeholders safely (no secrets committed) and the documentation clearly states what values/steps are required to sign the release APK for distribution.

constraints: Do not add any backend dependencies; backend must remain unused for producing the APK.

Do not modify immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
All user-facing text must be English.
nonGoals: Adding any new authentication or network-required functionality.
